title: log in
body: why i cant log in. In log in status says loading.... . what should i do?

replies.body: Your network might be having some problems reaching our login servers if you keep getting stuck in a loading loop. Double check this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), paying close attention to Port Forwarding and DNS options, but do make sure to go through each step.
